function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uneven distributions of daily activities can lead to segregated subsets of the population, increasing the growth rate of infectious outbreaks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Centralization of daily activities can result in higher r0 for urban epidemics, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effect on children’s r0 due to the breakup of activity hubs, potentially leading to targeted spread of contagious diseases among children.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate mobility parameters due to lack of real origin-destination data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited accessibility of massive mobility datasets","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for asymptomatic periods in disease spread modeling","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of reactive behavior in disease spread modeling","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of time-varying mobility matrices in disease spread analysis","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of mobility and contact data for infants and children at different educational stages","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unaccounted variations in mobility parameters for infected individuals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in defining and mapping variables within the numerical grid","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of infectious disease through the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in public transport ridership","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mass unemployment and increase in home working","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in air and noise pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of novel human coronavirus due to hypermobility and interconnectedness of transport networks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate existing transport policy approaches to respond to the new challenges posed by covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of recognition of the important role of individual choice and actions in delivering socially desired transport outcomes in a post-covid world.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic travelers exporting infection undetected across international borders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 to most countries on earth","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Individuals not following public health guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding in supermarkets","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on online shopping and home deliveries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased movement of people and goods may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging people to return to work and use private vehicles may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission in public spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of public transport and active travel may lead to overcrowding in public spaces, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to active travel options such as walking and cycling","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased confidence in the safety of public transport","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the efficacy and public acceptance of safety interventions in public transport","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant impact on air passenger transport due to global transmission of the virus and travel restrictions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial support for the aviation industry granted without strict environmental conditions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of the effects of mobility and travel behavior on disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of responsible transport concept","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to change in global transport policies and planning","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing policy and service environment","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New technological and service innovations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of suitable modes for responsible transport","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traveling for work-related activities increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imported items and perishable foodstuffs are likely to be transported by air, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for local cultural and religious practices during travel increases the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in the provision of quality public and active transport alternatives due to veneration of private car","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Struggles in promoting public transport due to social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of overcrowding in public transport","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouraging individual responsibility for personal actions can create a false sense of security and lead to complacency in following public health guidelines.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on individual responsibility may lead to a lack of oversight and regulation in ensuring safety and hygiene standards in public transport and shared mobility.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of social equity and accessibility in responsible transport policies may exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of contagious diseases in marginalized communities.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through international transport networks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of local mobility needs and conditions in transport policy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
